text: Mauro's first action was to write to his revered master at Ko"then, near Leipzig, asking for advice. In SO he described his distinguished patient and his symptoms. He told Hahnemann that he found Anglesey a strong, energetic man with a gentle and charming character, even-tempered and sedate, not easily irritated, patient and persevering, 'but he appears to despair of ever cured.
